name: Dragonflight
description: Feel the thrill of riding on your very own dragon in virtual reality. Produced by the academy award winning cinematic CGI masters behind The Matrix, Life of Pi, Hunger Games, Harry Potter, Zootopia, Snow White & the Huntsman.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 4590 / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 Storage: 800 MB available space
